```{r}
library(rio)
library(dplyr)
```
```{r}
dataPerú=import("PER_2021_LAPOP_AmericasBarometer_v1.2_w (1).dta")
```
```{r}
library(dplyr)

datanuevaPeru <- dataPerú %>%
  select("pais", "wvsi2", "b6", "anestg", "pn4", "exc6", "exc7new")
datanuevaPeru
```
```{r}
names(datanuevaPeru)
```

```{r}
names(datanuevaPeru) = c("Perú", "ParticipaciónP", "RespetoP", "ConfianzaP", "ToleranciaP", "TransparenciaP", "PercepciónP")
names(datanuevaPeru)
```
